headline: Rockwell Automation Report Finds CPG Industry Prioritizing Innovation Over Cost-Cutting
summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today announced the results of the 10th annual State of Smart Manufacturing Report: Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) Edition. The findings highlight how manufacturers are placing greater importance on innovation, workforce development, and long-term growth strategies.

headline: Guidewheel Appoints Charles Lawson as Chief Revenue Officer to Expand AI‑powered FactoryOps Worldwide
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, August 19, 2025--Guidewheel, the leader in AI-powered FactoryOps, today announced that Charles Lawson has joined the company as Chief Revenue Officer (CRO).
